programme.title: Fajar Di Bukhara
programme.desc: Antara tiga wanita iaitu Citra, tunangnya di kampung, Humaira, wanita yang ditemuinya ketika dia melanjutkan pengajian di Uzbekistan dan Nargiza, wanita Uzbekistan yang memerlukan perlindungan daripadanya.

programme.title: Melur Tetap Harum
programme.desc: Drama kemasyarakatan yang memaparkan hubungan kekeluargaan, persahabatan dan percintaan.

programme.desc: Majalah wanita yang memaparkan info dan tips-tips kecantikan dalaman dan luaran.

programme.title: Code Of Law - EP 9
programme.desc: A young poly student, Mei, is found running through the void deck with burns, scars and wounds all over her body. She collapses and dies, the victim of what appears to be several days of brutal abuse. The trail leads the police to her classmate and friend, Lydia. But what motive did Lydia have for hurting Mei to the point of killing her? When the lawyers, Jacob and Sabrina find out, they are stunned by the revelation.

Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.desc: (Encore) This game show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

He has resorted to collecting and selling discarded items to supplement the family's income. However, the building clutter has made his home unsafe for his children.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S1 - EP 5

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 - EP 8
programme.desc: SpongeBob, Patrick, Squidward and the rest of the Bikini Bottom crew return for more hilarious adventures!

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic S8 - EP 14
programme.desc: In the new Season 8, exciting new creatures join the Mane 6 (Twilight Sparkle, Rarity, Applejack, Pinkie Pie, Rainbow Dash and Fluttershy), including Silverstream the Hippogriff-Seapony, Smolder the Dragon and Yona the Yak, as they go on new epic adventures throughout new and familiar lands such as Mount Aris, Everfree Forest, Las Pegasus and more!

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven - EP 30
programme.desc: Mamoru End is a very talented goalkeeper and the grandson of one of the strongest goalkeepers in Japan, who died before he was born. Even though his skills are incredible, his school lacks a real soccer club as the six other members don't appear very interested even in training. The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

programme.title: Museum Mysteries - EP 1
programme.desc: Time-travelling historian and explorer extraordinaire, Captain Mer Lai En, is on a quest to recruit crew members to join him on his artefact collecting missions all around the world and all across time! Not only do crew members have to help solve all of the Captain's challenges and puzzles in his museum, they must also help Captain Mer Lai En fix the time-machine's flux chronometer. Will they succeed? Find out in Museum Mysteries!

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 19 - EP 11
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.desc: Nicholas just can't figure out why he can't get past the first date despite having some dates. Shane and Kimberly invite a dating expert to give him tips on what to do on first dates, and how to deal with dating anxieties to boost his confidence. Will Nicholas finally experience a breakthrough? Watch to find out.

Everyone is left stunned and delighted, even though they have no idea what just hit them.

programme.title: Kin - EP 387

programme.title: News 5
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: In Your Living Room With PCK And Jojo - EP 2
programme.desc: RIA DJ Zaza is doing home-based learning (HBL) with her kids and shows us how she's coping with it. Actor Yixi shares his talent for drawing with us while Wah Banana features the silly things some people do when they have to stay at home. Finally take a listen to Abangsapau's specially composed song - All we got is each other.

programme.title: Courage - EP 1
programme.desc: Singapore leaves no stone unturned in the fight against COVID-19. A behind-the-scenes observation of fearless medical and security professionals on the frontlines, battling an unseen enemy.

programme.title: Death Is Our Business S2 - EP 8

programme.title: Code Of Law - EP 10
programme.desc: Gary Wee, a taxi driver is found dead with a stab wound through the heart. As the cops investigate his murder, they discover a darker side to the story - Gary and his girlfriend were involved in an online scam where she would befriend men and persuade them to strip in front of their webcams while he recorded the footage and then blackmailed the men with it. One of these men, unfortunately, took offence and murdered him for it. Sabrina is shocked when she finds out it is Steven, her younger brother. Now, she must put emotions on the backburner and argue for her brother's life in court.

You Nian agrees to come home as soon as possible. (PG-些许暴力画面)Brandon从白教练那里感染性病，来打贵德泄愤，不满贵德没有提醒他。贵德决定教训白教练，与一班损友去围堵并痛打他，结果被捉到警局。淼淼得知贵德竟然纠众打人，非常震惊，向有年求助，有年答应尽快回来。.

programme.title: 寻花探草 Sr 1 Garden Of Treasure S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: "Garden Of Treasure " is a documentary on the healing functions and botanical characteristics of wild flowers and herbs which can also be used to cook simple and delicious flower dishes. 《寻花探草》是以药草拍摄为主的纪录片，介绍他们心目中的百搭花草，逐一分享花草的药疗功能和植物特性, 也化成一道道简单好味的花草料理。.

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper S2 - EP 36

programme.title: 武神赵子龙 Chinese Hero Zhao Zilong - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Zhao Zilong provides Xiahou Qingyi and her maid, who have lost all their money and belongings, a place to stay. Meantime, the revenge seeking bandits threaten to destroy the graves of Zilong's parents. (PG)(重)因坐骑跌落悬崖，所携带之银两与细软尽失，夏侯轻衣和其丫鬟无处栖身，只得借赵子龙的居处暂住。与此同时，要为他们的三寨主报仇的那班山贼，恫言将捣毁子龙双亲的坟墓，藉此以逼子龙现身。.

programme.title: 好好说 慢慢讲 2 Say It! Sr 2 - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Gurmit Singh and En Lai become Chef Daniel and Chef Ho Tien Tsai's assistant in this episode! Will they be able to buy the correct ingredients at the vegetable stall, seafood stall and provision store? Who can serve the dishes at the fastest speed? What difficulties will they face in the process? (重)这一集的《好好说 慢慢讲》要让葛米星和恩来分别当大厨Chef Daniel和何添财师傅的助手，通过买食材和烹饪学华语！谁能最快端上佳肴，完全取决于两位助手能不能用华语好好说慢慢讲，快、狠、准地买对和准备所有的材料！他们分别会遇到菜摊小姐、海鲜摊老板、杂货店老板、豆腐西施等等！过程中会遇到哪些难题？他们买错材料怎么办？到底谁会胜出呢？.

He makes the acquaintances of the cowardly two-sided turtle, the arrogant A Ku and the delicate Mei Mei. (重)美丽的鲤鱼湖遭受了癞皮蛇的祸害，小鲤鱼泡泡被迫游出凄凉的家乡，寻找龙的力量。他先后结识了胆小的双面龟，傲气的阿酷，娇柔的美美。.

programme.desc: (R) Xi Yue receives an invitation from her colleague to visit an exhibition preview. When Xi Yue attends the event, she finds out that the exhibit is filled with items that hold memories for her and Yan Xun. She finds out that this is part of Yan Xun's plan to regain her love. Will Xi Yue agree to reconcile with him? On the other hand, Ting Xuan is unable to accept that Wei Ren still has feelings for Zi Wei, and she initiates a breakup. (PG)(重)(大结局)喜悦收到同行邀请，请她来参观预展，喜悦欣然前往，却发现展览场摆设了很多她和彦勋具有共同回忆的物品。原来这一切都是彦勋精心策划，希望能挽回喜悦的心，喜悦会答应复合吗？另一方面，庭萱无法接受为人总是放不下梓惟，提出分手，并毅然出国当无国界医生……。.

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 19
programme.desc: Miao Miao follows You Nian and finds out that he is meeting his female colleague, Darlene. Miao Miao finds out that You Nian went overseas to work to avoid facing the daily arguments between his mother and her, causing her to feel very angry.... (PG-些许性相关语)淼淼偷偷跟踪有年，发现他竟与女同事Darlene见面。有年拒绝Darlene纠缠，指自己深爱妻子，Darlene却揭穿他根本不爱老婆，才一直续约，不想回来。原来有年不想面对每天吵架的老婆和妈妈，才出国工作，而不是为了赚钱养家，淼淼闻言怒极……。.

programme.title: 武神赵子龙 Chinese Hero Zhao Zilong - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Unintentionally, Zhao Zilong and Xiahou Qingyi get embroiled in a battle between the troops led by Gao Ze and the bandits. Li Quan comes to Zilong's rescue when Gao Ze is attacking Zilong. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)赵子龙与夏侯轻衣，无端被卷入官兵与山贼的混战之中。子龙遭领兵的高则袭击，险象环生，李全至此终于现身，救护师侄子龙于危急之中。.

programme.title: 阿嬷来做饭 Ah Ma Can Cook - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) 77-year-old Ah Ma, Mdm Chan Kieu, has been making Kuehs for her family for over 50 years. In this episode, she will demonstrate her Soon Kueh and Chives Kueh, while host Kym Ng and artiste Elvin Ng observe and learn from scratch. The duo fumbles in the kitchen as they tried their best to follow Ah Ma's steps. Will they be able to wrap the Kuehs as nicely as Ah Ma? (重)好吃又传统的笋粿和韭菜粿，哪里买？不如让阿嬷教你怎么做！77岁的陈娇阿嬷，12岁就开始“走荡江湖”，当过红头巾，也曾在街边卖吃，赚取生活费。婚后，她以农耕为生，渐渐地喜欢上园艺和烹饪。全家人最爱吃的就是她做的笋粿和韭菜粿。而这次，她要把多年的手艺，传授给主持人钟琴和戏剧阿哥黄俊雄。俩人是否能顺利做好传统粿？爱吃但不会煮的黄俊雄，连基本食材都搞不清楚，他又将如何面对这次的烹饪挑战呢？.

(PG)(重)思冬、国权与念夏、宣慈往查访昔日老师、经常去的酒吧、拳馆，所有人都认得国权和方行，却完全不认识思冬。思冬不知不觉来到教堂，求助于黎牧师。黎牧师告诉思冬，方行最后一次来教堂，说要去寻找自己。思冬也决定回香港，「寻找自己」。.

(重)在台湾彰化监狱，囚犯被称为“同学”，当局希望透过艺术治疗和熏陶让他们情绪上会有所抒发、心灵上有所寄托。在狱方所成立的儒林工坊，囚犯不仅能够接触并传承传统工艺，他们还可以学一技之长，为出狱后铺路。.

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)娜妍听说泰俊和世珍相约喝红酒，于是故意到红酒吧弹钢琴吸引泰俊的注意。泰俊情不自禁地吻娜妍。这一幕被世珍看到。世珍打娜妍一巴掌。.

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)艾瑞克赵一直找不着伽耶琴名匠的孙子吴赫，令他十分生气。景淑在胜珠的社群媒体看到胜珠结婚的消息，不敢相信她结婚了，于是立刻联络世弥。世弥想起了胜珠曾说过想用钱买老公的事，感到担心，便与景淑去找胜珠。.

programme.title: 身在异乡非异客 Strangers At Home - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) India has one of the most ethnic communities in the world. One of them is the Indian Chinese, most of whom reside in Kolkata. Their numbers are dwindling as the youths migrate for better prospects. This week, we explore this minority group's way of life and untold stories. (重)印度有13亿人口，是世上拥有最多族群、语言、宗教的国家之一。华人，是印度其中的一个少数群体。身为人口大国中的少数族裔，印度华人过着怎样的生活？他们与主流社会的关系又如何？加尔各答是印度最主要的华人社区，近半个世纪以来，老一辈的人有些选择留在当地生活、老去。也有许多年轻一代却对印度没有太大眷念，纷纷移居外国，追求更好的发展。如今，印度华人社群人数逐渐减少，华裔的传统文化，是不是也在印度随之式微呢？这一集节目探讨印度华人的故事。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Be it comfort food found in comics or the nostalgic taste of old Tokyo, the underlying spirit of these dishes are vividly personified in renowned Japanese literature. Host Youyi travels to Japan to have a taste of the dishes from classical and contemporary Japanese culture. (重)无论是漫画中传递温情的平凡菜肴，迎合都市快捷生活节奏的轻食，还是勾起回忆的浓浓古早味，日本历代文豪以精湛的文笔，捕捉食物的情意；借由笔墨让料理醇厚的味道持久留芳。这一集，主持人有懿透过味蕾，感受日式料理中蕴含的新旧文化。.

programme.title: My Coffee Prince - EP 17
programme.desc: Adapted from Korea's most popular drama series, Coffee Prince tell the story of four young people who meet together at a cafe as they navigate through love, life and their dreams.Raikal is a smart young man who hates the idea of being tied down to one career. Reluctant to join the family business, he is ordered by his grandmother to manage a cafe. Though reluctant to run the cafe, he slowly begins to immerse himself in the gourmet coffee business. Reluctantly, Dani admits to Mariam that she ever liked Amri before but has given up hope ever since she knew that Mariam is his lover. She is now in love with Raikal but is unsure if what she is doing is right. Mariam advises her to tell Raikal the truth about herself but Dani is not ready to reveal her true identity yet.

programme.title: Projek Showcase - EP 4
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. JEBAT is a modern day adaptation of the infamous legendary tale of Hang Tuah & Hang Jebat; a story about how a strong friendship and brotherhood bond could disintegrate tragically due to clashing values & betrayal.Jebat and Iman are best friends from young even though they come from different backgrounds. Jebat is extremely protective over Iman and his family. When Jebat finds out that they have both fallen in love with Khatijah, Jebat decides to give her up to Iman even though she has feelings for Jebat. Iman is accused of being a corrupt policeman, framed by a gang leader who hates him. When Iman's sister is raped by this same gang leader, Jebat kills him in revenge. Would Iman choose the law and arrest Jebat? Or would he let Jebat escape the police out of loyalty and gratitude to his best friend?

programme.title: Smart Parents

programme.title: Bakul Telur Emas

programme.title: Rencah Hidup

programme.title: Psikosis
programme.desc: Psikosis adalah sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah-kisah, pengalaman dan rawatan tentang pelbagai penyakit mental bersama hos Aiman Amri. Psikosis pada minggu ini memahami lebih dekat tentang Sindrom Tourette.

programme.title: Denai Warisan
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang dihoskan oleh Zarif Kamil menjelajah serta mengkaji tempat bersejarah ketika zaman penjajahan di Tanah Melayu.

programme.desc: Singapore leaves no stone unturned in the fight against COVID-19. A behind-the-scenes observation of fearless medical and security professionals on the frontlines, battling an unseen enemy.

programme.title: AWOLNATION
programme.sub-title: How the band came to be
programme.desc: AWOLNATION's frontman Aaron Bruno, and the people who rode the wave with him, talk about the band's success. AWOLNATION may perform to sold-out shows, but their road to success has been filled with setbacks, frustrations and learning experiences. Frontman Aaron Bruno tells the band's story.

programme.title: The final preparation
programme.desc: As the 2018 season draws to an end, the athletes spend time with family before the final events of the year. As the 2018 season draws to an end, Jordy Smith, Carissa Moore, Julian Wilson and Lakey Peterson spend quality time with family, friends and coaches before the final two events of the year in Hawaii.

programme.title: The end game
programme.desc: Follow Julian Wilson and Jordy Smith as they look to win more than just the prestigious Pipe Masters trophy. The Banzai Pipeline on Hawaii's North Shore is home to the final and most prestigious event of the WSL Championship Tour. With the world title and triple crown also at stake, for Julian Wilson and Jordy Smith only a win at the Pipe will do.

programme.title: Addicted to Life
programme.sub-title: Inside the mind of an action sports athlete
programme.desc: The achievements of action sports athletes are celebrated in a collection of profiles. A globetrotting adventure immortalises the stories behind the achievements of modern action sports athletes. Among the all-star line-up are two of Maui's very own: big wave surfer Tyler Larronde and two-time Kiteboarding World Champion Jesse Richman.

programme.title: The Sacred Leap
programme.desc: In 18th century Hawaii, a king and his warriors dived off a cliff – it was the origins of modern cliff diving. Since the 18th century, the art of cliff diving has evolved well past its Hawaiian origins. Discover how the Cliff Diving World Series got its start and watch rare footage of cliff diving legends performing in their formative years.

programme.title: Waves for Change
programme.desc: Meet the people behind Waves for Change, the African social enterprise using surf therapy to combat violence. Discover the story of Waves for Change, the South African social enterprise using surf therapy to help break the wave of violence that shapes township life.

programme.title: SafeMotos
programme.desc: See how a simple mobile app hopes to dramatically cut down on traffic deaths in Rwanda. See how a simple mobile app hopes to dramatically cut down on traffic deaths in Rwanda, while offering riders a safer way to get to work and school.

programme.title: Why the world fell in love with Monument Valley
programme.desc: Ustwo Games are creating two new games they hope will be even more successful than Monument Valley. Ustwo Games talk about the pressure of trying to create two new games they hope will eclipse the success of their BAFTA-winning predecessor Monument Valley, while sharing the same DNA of being friendly, approachable and open to everyone.

programme.title: The story behind Dead Cells
programme.desc: With no bosses, equal pay and equal say, this fiercely independent studio are doing things differently. With no bosses, equal pay and equal say, this fiercely independent studio are doing things differently. But when huge success comes so unexpectedly, how will this team of eight reach new heights without losing touch of what makes them so awesome?

programme.title: The motocross rider
programme.desc: Glimpse into the madness of motocross racing and learn why it's so physically demanding for its riders. Extreme focus, top physical fitness and absolute fearlessness are a few of the qualities a motocross rider needs to succeed. Glimpse into the madness of motocross racing and learn why it's so physically demanding for its riders.

programme.title: The enduro rider
programme.desc: See what it takes to be the best in a discipline that's demanding both mentally and physically. Watch an enduro racer in his natural habitat. Enduro athletes have to battle natural terrain each time they ride. See what it takes to be the best in a discipline that's demanding both mentally and physically.

programme.title: The superbike rider
programme.desc: Venturing into the realm where riders are racing at more than 300kph, this is look into superbike racing. Getting away from the dirt, we venture into the realm where riders are racing at more than 300kph, this is a look into superbike racing.

programme.title: A Deeper Shade of Blue
programme.desc: This is not a surf movie. It's a film about freedom, innovation and connection with the natural world. Surfing, at its inception, was about freedom, happiness and a connection to the ocean. From the birth of surfing to modern innovations, this is the story of the connection between humans and the sea.

programme.title: Algo Está Pasando
programme.desc: Discover the story behind the people who took rap into a country ruled by a political dictatorship. Take a journey through 30 years of history and get a glimpse into the story behind the people who, despite limited resources, took rap into a country ruled by a political dictatorship.

programme.title: Amazon High Tide
programme.desc: Ramón Navarro is a surfer brave enough to cross the Amazon jungle and find a secret wave spot. Big wave surfer Ramón Navarro is determined enough to cross the remote Amazon jungle in Brazil in search of a secret wave spot.

programme.title: Toronto Park Sessions
programme.desc: In Toronto, Kriss Kyle meets up with Drew Bezanson, one of the world’s most progressive BMX park riders. In Toronto, Kriss Kyle meets up with Drew Bezanson, one of the world’s most progressive BMX park riders. Drew invites Kriss to ride in the renowned Joyride 150 park as well as the city’s hidden riding spots, which leads to a sensational new edit.

programme.title: X Games in Barcelona
programme.desc: Kriss Kyle goes to the X Games in Barcelona, then travels to Italy to ride street with BMXer Simone Barraco. Kriss Kyle goes to the X Games in Barcelona, then travels to Italy to ride street with BMXer Simone Barraco. Following a trick-filled session, Simone invites Kriss to his hometown of Genoa to ride local spots and sample his grandma’s famous ravioli.

programme.title: A changed man
programme.desc: As we hit the half way point Ross reflects on how his body is adapting to suit the challenge. As we hit the half way point of the Great British Swim Ross reflects on how his body is adapting to suit the challenge, and gives us three reasons why he is in love with the Scottish coast.

programme.title: Perspective
programme.desc: Four skaters from different backgrounds and styles convene in Arizona to explore new territory and tricks. Reflecting on how their different backgrounds influence their skating styles, four world class skaters join forces in Arizona to explore new territory and tricks.

programme.title: Madrid
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe presents the world's most exciting cities – this time, he says ¡Hola! from Madrid. In Madrid, Hubertus visits a very different type of factory: Factum Arte, where the dreams of the world's artists become reality. He also gets to know the street art collective Boa Mistura, hangs out with DJ and motorcycle racer Fonsi Nieto and more.
